# Conda
Conda is an open-source package and environment management system. It allows you to create isolated environments with different versions of packages and dependencies.

## Installation
Conda is a package and environment manager for Python and other languages.

- Official Miniconda installer: [Miniconda installation guide](https://www.anaconda.com/docs/getting-started/miniconda/install)
- zsh completion/plugins: [conda-zsh-completion](https://github.com/conda-incubator/conda-zsh-completion)

Mirrors: If your connection to upstream hosts is slow or unstable, consider using a closer mirror to speed downloads: [Tsinghua Anaconda mirror help](https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/anaconda/)
# Conda
Conda is an open-source package and environment management system. It allows you to create isolated environments with different versions of packages and dependencies.

## Installation
Conda is a package and environment manager for Python and other languages.

- Official Miniconda installer: [Miniconda installation guide](https://www.anaconda.com/docs/getting-started/miniconda/install)
- zsh completion/plugins: [conda-zsh-completion](https://github.com/conda-incubator/conda-zsh-completion)

Mirrors: If your connection to upstream hosts is slow or unstable, consider using a closer mirror to speed downloads: [Tsinghua Anaconda mirror help](https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/anaconda/)
